sourcesContent: import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { AdressToInvoice } from 'src/app/interface/adressToInvoice'; import { AdressToSend } from 'src/app/interface/adressToSend'; import { ClientEntity } from 'src/app/interface/clientEntity'; import { Country } from 'src/app/interface/country'; import { FormConfig } from 'src/app/interface/formsConfig'; import { IdType } from 'src/app/interface/idType'; import { AuthServicio } from 'src/app/servicios/auth.service'; import { PhoneType } from 'src/app/interface/phoneType'; @Component({ selector: 'app-profile-description', templateUrl: './profile-description.component.html', }) export class ProfileDescriptionComponent { constructor( private _Auth: AuthServicio ){ } selectCountryInfo: Country[] = []; selectPhoneInfo: PhoneType[] = []; selectDocumentInfo: IdType[] = []; client: ClientEntity = { cliente: 0, email: "", contrasenia: "", primerNombre: "", segundoNombre: "", primerApellido: "", segundoApellido: "", tipoTelefono: {id: 0, tipoTelefono: ""}, telefono: "", pais: {id: 0, nombrePais: ""}, numeroDocumento: "", tipoDocumento: {id: 0, tipoDocumento: ""} } sendAdress: AdressToSend={ id: 0, direccion: "", zipCode: "", cliente: 0, pais: 0 }; invoiceAdress: AdressToInvoice={ id: 0, direccion: "", zipCode: "", cliente:0, pais: 0 }; ngOnInit(): void { let session = this._Auth.session; this.client = session.client; this.invoiceAdress = session.invoiceAdress; this.sendAdress = session.sendAdress; this._Auth.formsInfo(). subscribe((response: FormConfig)=>{ this.selectCountryInfo = response.countries; this.selectDocumentInfo = response.documents; this.selectPhoneInfo = response.phones; }).add() localStorage.setItem(this.configSession, JSON.stringify(auth)); } }
